rules.name: Greeting
rules.description: Plays a greeting

params.message: Good {{System.TimeOfDay}}. Thanks for calling Foxtel!

rules.name: Transfers to outages
rules.description: Outages menu transfer

rules.name: COVID messaging
rules.description: COVID messaging

params.message: We are currently experiencing higher than usual call volumes due to COVID impacts. You may experience longer than usual wait times should you need to speak with a person.

rules.name: Transfer to Identification
rules.description: Transfers to identification

name: 00100200 - Identification
description: Handles customer identification in the case of multiple accounts or withheld phone number

rules.name: Main menu when identified
rules.description: When the customer is identified or we have no accounts, go to the main menu.

rules.name: Identification menu
rules.description: Plays a message to show we are in identification

params.message: To help us identify your account we need more information from you. The current value of account disambiguate is: {{AccountDisambiguate}}

rules.name: Get phone number
rules.description: Prompts the customer for the phone number when CLI is not provided or we found no accounts.

params.offerMessage: Please enter the ten digit phone number associated with your Foxtel account followed by the hash key. Phone numbers should start with zero and include the area code.
params.confirmationMessage: Thanks! I got your phone number as {{characterSpeechFast CustomerPhoneNumber}}. If this is correct press 1. Press 2 to enter a different phone number.
params.errorMessage1:
Ok, lets try that again. 
Please enter the 10 digit phone number, starting with zero, that is on your Foxtel account.
params.errorMessage3: I am unable to find an account, but our team can help.

rules.name: Get post code
rules.description: Prompts the customer for their post code associated with their account

params.offerMessage: To help us locate your Foxtel account, please enter your 4 digit postcode using your phone's keypad. Then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: Thanks! I got your postcode as {{characterSpeechFast PostCode}}. If this is correct, press 1. To enter a different postcode, press 2.
params.errorMessage1: You've entered an invalid postcode. Let's try again.
params.errorMessage2: It is still an invalid postcode. Please try again.
params.errorMessage3: Sorry, I did not get that.

rules.name: Get date of birth
rules.description: Prompts the customer for the date of birth associated with their account

params.offerMessage: So we can locate your account, please enter your eight digit date of birth using your phone's keypad. Two digits for the day, two digits for the month and four digits for the year. Then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: Thanks! I got your date of birth as the {{dateOfBirthHuman DateOfBirth}}. If this is correct, press 1. To enter a different date of birth, press 2.
params.errorMessage1: Please enter your date of birth with the Day first.
params.errorMessage2: That is still not a valid date of birth.
params.errorMessage3: Okay, I can't find your account right now, but our team can help.

rules.name: Found account message
rules.description: Plays a message if an account was found

params.message: Hi {{Customer.FirstName}}, we successfully located your Foxtel account!

rules.name: No account message
rules.description: Plays a message when no account was found

params.message: We failed to find a Foxtel account, we will get someone to help you.

rules.name: Loop Identification
rules.description: Loops back into identification until we have identified

name: 00100300 - Choose customer scenario
description: Prompts the caller for a customer scenario as a number between 1 and 9 inclusive. This is used to pick mock web service responses.

rules.name: Select customer scenario
rules.description: Prompts the customer for a single digit customer scenario identifier

params.offerMessage: Please enter a single digit customer scenario identifier using your phone's keypad. Then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: You have selected customer scenario: {{CustomerScenario}}. If this is correct press 1. Press 2 to select a different scenario.
params.errorMessage1: You didn't enter a single digit customer scenario identifier.
params.errorMessage2: You didn't enter a single digit customer scenario identifier. The customer scenario identifier controls mock web service responses.
params.errorMessage3: It sounds like you are having trouble selecting a customer scenario identifier.

rules.name: Transfer to main menu
rules.description: Transfers to the main menu

name: 00200000 - Foxtel main menu
description: Allows customers to choose their intent from the DTMF menu presented

rules.name: Options to select intent
rules.description: Customers enter the intent handling from self service flows. A DTMF menu is presented to the customers to select their intent.

params.offerMessage:
To make a payment or discuss your bill, press 1.
To order a main event, press 2.
For help if your Foxtel isn't working properly, press 3.
To enquire about changing your Foxtel box, channel package or if you are moving home moving your Foxtel service, press 4.
To enquire about cancelling your Foxtel service, press 5.
To test features of the rules engine press 6.

rules.name: Verification attempt increment
rules.description: Increments the number of verification attempts for this customer

rules.name: Advise verification attempt count
rules.description: Debug the verification attempt count

params.message: This is verification attempt {{VerificationAttempt}}.

rules.name: Advise of failed verification
rules.description: Advises the customer they have failed verification

params.message: Sorry, I have failed to verify your identity.  Please hold the line and I will get a Foxtel agent to assist you.

rules.name: Fail multiple verification attempts
rules.description: If the customer has tried verification more than three times, transfer to an agent

rules.name: Confirm post code
rules.description: If the customer hasn't entered post code during identification request and compare

params.offerMessage: For security, we need you to confirm the postcode of your Foxtel account. Please enter your 4 digit postcode and then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: Thanks! I got your postcode as {{characterSpeechFast PostCode}}. If this is correct press 1. To re-enter a postcode press 2.
params.errorMessage1: You've entered an invalid postcode. Let's try again.
params.errorMessage2: It is still an invalid postcode. Please try again.
params.errorMessage3: Sorry, I did not get that.

rules.name: Check the customer postcode
rules.description: If the post code doesn't match play an error.

params.message: The postcode you entered does not match the account postcode.

rules.name: Clear invalid postcode
rules.description: Clears invalid post codes

rules.name: Bump invalid postcode
rules.description: Bumps invalid postcodes

rules.name: Confirm date of birth
rules.description: If the customer hasn't entered their date of birth prompt for it.

params.offerMessage: For security, we need you to confirm your date of birth. Please enter your 8 digit date of birth using your phone's keypad, and then press hash. Use 2 digits for day, 2 digits for month and 4 digits for year.
params.confirmationMessage: Thanks! I got your date of birth as the {{dateOfBirthHuman DateOfBirth}}. If this is correct press 1. Otherwise, to enter another date of birth, press 2.
params.errorMessage2: Please enter your date of birth. While Entering, please use two numbers for the day, 2 numbers for the month, and 4 numbers for the year.
params.errorMessage3: Okay, I can't find your account right now, but our team can help.

rules.name: Alerts invalid date of birth
rules.description: Tells the customer they didn't get the date of birth

params.message: The date of birth you entered does not match the account date of birth.

rules.name: Clear invalid date of birth
rules.description: Clears invalid date of birth

rules.name: Bump invalid date of birth
rules.description: If the date of birth is invalid, bump the customer out

rules.name: Go to billing post verification
rules.description: Go to billing after verification

name: 00211000 - Retrieve payment profile
description:
Fetch the customers overdue and balance.
Check if the customer has direct debit already setup or not.

rules.name: Retrieve payment profile
rules.description: Loads the customers payment profile

params.functionMessage:
<speak>
  I am looking up your billing details, Please hold the line.
  <break time="3s"/>
</speak>

rules.name: Check for errors
rules.description: Checks for error loading the customer's payment profile and transfers to a human.

params.message: I encountered an error loading your billing details.

rules.name: Transfers to billing menu
rules.description: Transfers to the billing menu

name: 00212000 - Main billing menu
description: Main menu for billing handles direct debit and no direct debit options

rules.name: DirectDebit menu
rules.description: The menu for customers with an existing direct debit

params.offerMessage:
To make a payment press 1.
To update your direct debit details press 2.
{{#ifeq AccountBalancePlayed 'true'}}To hear your account balance again press 3.{{else}}To hear your account balance press 3.{{/ifeq}}
For any other billing enquiry press 4.

rules.name: No DirectDebit menu
rules.description: The menu for customers with no direct debit

params.offerMessage:
To make a payment press 1.
To set up a direct debit press 2.
{{#ifeq AccountBalancePlayed 'true'}}To hear your account balance again press 3.{{else}}To hear your account balance press 3.{{/ifeq}}
For any other billing enquiry press 4.

name: 00212100 - Make a payment
description: Customer intent recorded to make a payment

rules.name: Make a payment
rules.description: Intent of customer is to make  a payment

params.message: We have recorded your intent to make a payment.

rules.name: Billing main menu
rules.description: Back to billing main menu

name: 00212130 - Direct debit setup or not
description: Check if customer has existing direct debit with bank account or not

rules.name: Sets OfferUpdateDirectDebit flag
rules.description: Sets the flag to offer direct debit

rules.name: Read account balance
rules.description: Read the account balance if it hasn't been read already

rules.name: Clears OfferUpdateDirectDebit
rules.description: Clears the OfferUpdateDirectDebit flag

rules.name: Offer bailout for setup
rules.description: When customers don't have an exiting direct debit offer a bail out

params.offerMessage:
You can set up a Direct Debit so that payments are taken out of your bank account or creditcard.
If you would like to continue setting up Direct Debit, press 1.
If not, press 2.

rules.name: Existing direct debit with bank
rules.description: Customer has existing direct debit setup with bank account

params.offerMessage:
You currently have your Direct Debit set up with your bank account.
To change your bank account information, press 1.
To switch to creditcard, press 2.

rules.name: Existing direct debit with credit card
rules.description: Customer has direct debit setup with credit card

params.offerMessage:
You currently have your Direct Debit set up with a credit card.
To change your credit card information, press 1.
To switch to bank account, press 2.

rules.name: Customer has no existing direct debit
rules.description: When the customer has no existing direct debit offset bank or credit card setup.

params.dtmf1: 00212220 - Setup direct debit with bank account entry point
params.offerMessage:
To use a bank account, press 1.
To use a creditcard, press 2.

rules.name: Fall through back to billing menu
rules.description: If no previous menus match go back to main menu

name: 00212150 - Update direct debit entry point
description: Educational message and name check of customers who want to update bank details

rules.name: Educational message
rules.description: Specifies BSB and Account number is required to update direct debit with bank account

params.message: To update your Direct Debit with your bank account you'll need the BSB and your account number. Please have those details ready.

rules.name: Name check of customer
rules.description: Checks if the customer bank account name is same as Foxtel account name

params.dtmf2: 00212160 - If bank account name is different
params.offerMessage:
First, If the name on the bank account is the same as the name on the Foxtel account, press 1.
If the name is different, press 2.

name: 00212160 - If bank account name is different
description: If customer bank account name does not match Foxtel name

rules.name: Transfer to agent
rules.description: If name check fails transfer customer to agent queue

params.message: Direct debit details can only be added or changed by the account holder or an authorised person on the account.

name: 00212210 - Collect BSB and Account number
description: Customer intent saved to update direct debit

rules.name: Collect customer BSB
rules.description: Collect 6 digit BSB from the customer

params.offerMessage: Using your phone's keypad, please enter your bank's 6 digit BSB number and then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage:
I understood {{characterSpeechSlow BankAccountBSB}}.
If that's correct, press 1.
To re-enter BSB, press 2.
params.errorMessage1: Let's try again. Your bank's BSB number is exactly 6 digits that can be found on your bank statement, or on your bank's website or mobile app.
params.errorMessage3: Sorry, I did not get that.

rules.name: Validate BSB
rules.description: Validates the BSB

params.functionMessage:
<speak>
   I am checking your BSB. Please hold the line.
  <break time="3s"/>
</speak>

rules.name: Count BSB user errors
rules.description: Counts the number of user errors in BSB Validation

rules.name: Count BSB system errors
rules.description: Count the number of system errors

rules.name: Transfer to agent on repeat BSB validation failures
rules.description: If the customer fails BSB validation > 2 times go to an agent

params.message: We failed to validate your BSB number.

rules.name: Transfer to agent on system error
rules.description: Go to agent when system error count > 1

params.message: We failed to validate your BSB number due to a system error.

rules.name: System error message restart
rules.description: Refetches the BSB on first system error

params.message: We detected an issue while validating your BSB. Please try again.

rules.name: Allow the customer to continue
rules.description: The customer failed validation of their BSB ask them if they want to try again

params.offerMessage: The BSB you entered: {{characterSpeechSlow BankAccountBSB}}, was not valid.  If you like to try another BSB press 1. To cancel setting up your direct debit, press 2.

rules.name: On BSB validation failure restart
rules.description: Restart on BSB validation failures

rules.name: Collect bank account number
rules.description: Collect bank account number from the customer

params.offerMessage: Next, please enter your account number, and then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage:
That was {{characterSpeechSlow BankAccountNumber}}.
If correct, press 1.
To re-enter Account number, press 2.
params.errorMessage1: Let's try again. Your bank account number is up to 10 digits that can be found on your bank statement near the BSB number, or on your bank's website or mobile app. Please enter it now.
params.errorMessage2: Let's try one more time. If you have your bank account number, please enter it now.
params.errorMessage3: Seems like we're having some trouble.

rules.name: Confirm BSB and Account number
rules.description: Read out customer BSB & Account number

params.offerMessage:
To confirm, you want to update your Direct Debit to use your {{ValidateBSB.BSBName}} account, with BSB number {{characterSpeechSlow BankAccountBSB}},  and account number {{characterSpeechSlow BankAccountNumber}}. 
If correct, press 1.
Otherwise, press 2.

rules.name: Update Direct debit
rules.description: Calls setup payment profile

params.functionMessage:
<speak>
   I am setting up your direct debit. Please hold the line.
  <break time="3s"/>
</speak>

rules.name: Setup payment profile system error
rules.description: Advises of system error

params.message: We had issues setting up your direct debit.

rules.name: Transfer on system error
rules.description: If we get a failure in Setup payment profile go to an agent

rules.name: Back to billing main menu
rules.description: Advise success and return to the billing menu

params.message: I successfully set up your direct debit!

name: 00212214 - Change the entered bank details
description: If customer wish to change the entered bank details

rules.name: To change the bank details
rules.description: If customer wish to change their updated bank account details

params.offerMessage:
To change the bank details, press 1.
To use a credit card, press 2.
To cancel the update, press 3.

rules.name: Change bank details
rules.description: If customer wish to change bank details

name: 00212220 - Setup direct debit with bank account entry point
description: Educational message and name check of customers who want to update bank details

rules.name: Educational message
rules.description: Specifies BSB and Account number is required to update direct debit with bank account

params.message: To update your Direct Debit with your bank account you'll need the BSB and your account number. Please have those details ready.

rules.name: Name check of customer
rules.description: Checks if the customer bank account name is same as Foxtel account name

params.dtmf2: 00212160 - If bank account name is different
params.offerMessage:
First, If the name on the bank account is the same as the name on the Foxtel account, press 1.
If the name is different, press 2.

rules.name: Main billing menu
rules.description: When customer intent is update direct debit with bank account

rules.name: Fetch account balance
rules.description: Fetches the customer's account balance

params.functionMessage:
<speak>
  I am looking up your account balance. Please hold the line.
  <break time="3s"/>
</speak>

rules.name: Account balance error
rules.description: Plays a message on failure to load account balance and returns the billing menu

params.message: Sorry, I failed to load your account balance.

rules.name: Record account balance played
rules.description: Records that an account balance has been heard

rules.name: Zero balance
rules.description: Message for customer account balance and overdue equals zero

params.message: You have no outstanding charges on your account, and your balance is zero.

rules.name: Balance with no overdue
rules.description: Message for customers with balance but no overdues.

params.message: The total amount due is {{formatCentsAsDollars AccountBalance.SumBalance}}.

rules.name: Non zero balance with overdues
rules.description: Message when a customer has a balance and overdues

params.message: The total amount due is {{formatCentsAsDollars AccountBalance.SumBalance}}. The amount of {{formatCentsAsDollars AccountBalance.PastDueTotal}} is now overdue.

rules.name: Go to setup direct debit
rules.description: Goes to setup direct debit if required

rules.name: Back to billing menu
rules.description: Back to the billing menu

name: 00212400 - Transfer to billing queue
description: Transfers the customer to agent queue

rules.name: Skill is closed
rules.description: Message when the skill is closed

params.message: This department is currently closed. Our operating hours are 8am to 6pm Monday to Friday.

rules.name: Bump the customer
rules.description: Skill closed bump to parent menu

rules.name: Privacy message
rules.description: Privacy message

params.message:
We'll be recording this call to help coach and develop our team. 
Any personal information you provide us will be handled in accordance with our privacy policy, which is available at foxtel.com.au

rules.name: Transfer to agent
rules.description: Transfer to agent queue

rules.name: Billing error
rules.description: Transfer customer to the agent queue

params.message: I am having some trouble here. Please hold while I transfer you to an agent.

rules.name: Transfer to agent
rules.description: Transfer to an agent after 3 invalid attempts

name: 00220000 - Main event menu
description: Allows customers to order a main event

rules.name: Order main event
rules.description: Transfers customers to main event flow

params.message: Please wait while I transfer you to the main event flow

rules.name: terminate
rules.description: to hang up

name: 00230000 - Technical support menu
description: Transfers customers to technical support flow

rules.name: Technical support
rules.description: Customers are transferred to technical support flow for any issues with Foxtel service

params.message: Please wait while I transfer you to technical support flow.

rules.name: terminate
rules.description: to hang up

rules.name: Change service flow
rules.description: Allows customers to change any of their Foxtel service

params.message: Please wait while I transfer you to service change flow.

rules.name: terminate
rules.description: to hang up

rules.name: To cancel Foxtel service
rules.description: Allows customers to terminate their Foxtel service

params.message: Please wait while I transfer you to retention flow.

rules.name: terminate
rules.description: To hang up

rules.name: Main menu
rules.description: Main menu

params.offerMessage:
Press 1 to test update features.
Press 2 to test input features.
Press 3 to test transfer features.
Press 4 to test operating hours.
Press 5 to test integration features.

rules.name: Menu
rules.description: Updates menu

params.offerMessage:
Press 1 to test the audit feature.
Press 2 to test setting contact attributes.
Press 3 to test updating state.
Press 4 to test emitting a CloudWatch metric.
Press 5 to return to the main menu.

rules.name: Before message
rules.description: Audit message

params.message: I am about to invoke an audit operation.

rules.name: Audit
rules.description: Audits an operation

rules.name: After message
rules.description: After message

params.message: The audit operation is complete.

rules.name: Return
rules.description: Return to the parent menu

rules.name: Before message
rules.description: Before message

params.message: I am about to set a contact attribute.

rules.name: Set attribute
rules.description: Sets an attribute

rules.name: After message
rules.description: After message

params.message: I have finished setting the contact attribute.

rules.name: Return
rules.description: Returns to the parent menu

rules.name: State set message
rules.description: Message plays when state is set

params.message: A state value already exists with value:  {{TestState}}.

rules.name: State not set message
rules.description: Plays when the state is not set

params.message: A state value is not currently set.

rules.name: Before message
rules.description: Message that plays before updating state

params.message: I am about to set the state value.

rules.name: Update state
rules.description: Updates the state

rules.name: After message
rules.description: Message that plays after setting the state

params.message: The value of the state is now: {{TestState}}

rules.name: Return
rules.description: Returns to the parent menu

rules.name: Before message
rules.description: Message played before the metric

params.message: I am about to emit a CloudWatch metric.

rules.name: Emit metric
rules.description: Emits a metric

rules.name: After message
rules.description: A message that plays after a metric has been emitted

params.message: I have successfully emitted a CloudWatch metric.

rules.name: Return
rules.description: Return to the parent menu

rules.name: Menu
rules.description: Inputs menu

params.offerMessage:
Press 1 to test fetching a customer's date of birth.
Press 2 to test fetching a customer's postcode.
Press 3 to test fetching a customer's phone number.
Press 4 to return to the main menu.

name: 00521000 - Test get date of birth
description: Tests fetching a date of birth

rules.name: Read date of birth
rules.description: If the customer has already entered a date of birth, read it back

params.message: You have already entered your date of birth as the {{dateOfBirthHuman CustomerDOB}}.

rules.name: Get date of birth
rules.description: Tests reading date of birth

params.offerMessage: Please enter your 8 digit date of birth using your phone's keypad. Then press hash. 2 digits for the day, 2 digits for the month. 4 digits for the year.
params.confirmationMessage: You entered your date of birth as the {{dateOfBirthHuman CustomerDOB}}.  If this is correct, press 1.  Press 2 to enter another date of birth.
params.errorMessage1: You failed to enter a valid date of birth.
params.errorMessage2: You failed a second time to enter a valid date of birth.
params.errorMessage3: It sounds like you are having issues entering your date of birth. I will fetch someone to assist you.

rules.name: Return
rules.description: Returns to the parent menu

rules.name: Read postcode
rules.description: Reads a postcode back to a customer

params.message: You have already provided your postcode as {{characterSpeechSlow PostCode}}.

rules.name: Fetch post code
rules.description: Fetches post code from the customer

params.offerMessage: Please enter the 4 digit postcode for your Foxtel account and then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: You entered your post code as {{characterSpeechSlow PostCode}}. If this is correct press 1. Press 2 to enter another postcode.
params.errorMessage1: You failed to enter a valid 4 digit postcode.
params.errorMessage2: Use your phone's keypad to enter a 4 digit postcode.
params.errorMessage3: It sounds like you are having issues entering your postcode. I will fetch someone to assist.

rules.name: Return
rules.description: Returns to the parent menu

rules.name: Read phone number
rules.description: If the phone is set read it back

params.message: You have already provided your phone number as {{characterSpeechSlow PhoneNumber}}.

rules.name: Get phone number
rules.description: Tests fetching a phone number

params.offerMessage: Please enter the ten digit phone number associated with your Foxtel account and then press hash. Please include the area code. All numbers should start with a zero.
params.confirmationMessage: You entered your phone number as {{characterSpeechSlow PhoneNumber}}. If this is correct press 1. To enter another number press 2.
params.errorMessage1: You didn't enter a valid phone number.
params.errorMessage2: The phone number you entered was not valid. It must start with a 0 and be 10 digits long.
params.errorMessage3: It sounds like you are having issues entering your phone number. I will fetch someone to assist you.

rules.name: Return
rules.description: Returns to the parent menu

description: Tests transfer features like queue and flow transfers

Press 2 to test a flow transfer.
Press 3 to transfer to an external number.
Press 4 to test a rule set prompt.

Press 6 to return to the main menu.

params.offerMessage:
To test morning hours press 1.
To test afternoon hours press 2.
To test always open hours press 3.
To test always closed hours press 4.
To return to the main menu press 5

rules.name: Open message

params.message: The time is currently: {{System.TimeLocal}} in the {{System.TimeOfDay}}. The morning skill is currently open.

rules.name: Closed message

params.message: The time is currently: {{System.TimeLocal}} in the {{System.TimeOfDay}}. The morning skill is currently closed.

rules.name: Integration menu
rules.description: Integration menu

params.offerMessage:
Press 1 to test retrieve account balance.
Press 2 to test setup payment profile.
Press 3 to test BSB validation.
Press 4 to return to the main menu.

rules.name: Fetch customer scenario
rules.description: Fetches the customer scenario

params.offerMessage: Please enter a single digit customer scenario identifier using your phone's keypad. Then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: You have selected customer scenario: {{CustomerScenario}}. If this is correct press 1. Press 2 to select a different scenario.
params.errorMessage1: You didn't enter a single digit customer scenario identifier.
params.errorMessage2: You didn't enter a single digit customer scenario identifier. The customer scenario identifier controls mock web service responses.
params.errorMessage3: It sounds like you are having trouble selecting a customer scenario identifier.

rules.name: Account balance
rules.description: Loads account balance

params.functionMessage:
<speak>
  I am just loading your account balance, please hold the line.
  <break time="2s"/>
</speak>

rules.name: Plays account balance
rules.description: Plays the customer's account balance

params.message: Your account balance is currently {{formatCentsAsDollars AccountBalance.SumBalance}}.  Your overdue amount is currently {{formatCentsAsDollars AccountBalance.PastDueTotal}}.

rules.name: Debug error
rules.description: Debugs an integration error

params.message: Retrieving account balance failed. The error cause was:  {{IntegrationErrorCause}}

rules.name: Return
rules.description: Returns the the parent menu

rules.name: Get BSB
rules.description: Fetches BSB

params.offerMessage: Please enter your 6 digit B.S.B. number, and then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: I received your B.S.B. number as {{characterSpeechFast BankAccountBSB}}. If this is correct, press 1. To enter another B.S.B. number, press 2.
params.errorMessage1: You didn't enter a valid B.S.B number.
params.errorMessage2: You didn't enter a valid 6 digit B.S.B. number. This is provided by your bank.
params.errorMessage3: It sounds like you are having issues entering your B.S.B. number. I will fetch someone to help.

rules.name: Get bank account number
rules.description: Fetches the bank account number

params.offerMessage: Please enter your bank account number using your telephone's keypad. Then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: I received your bank account number as {{characterSpeechFast BankAccountNumber}}. If this is correct, press 1. To enter another bank account number, press 2.
params.errorMessage1: You didn't enter a valid bank account number.
params.errorMessage2: You failed to enter a valid bank account number.
params.errorMessage3: It sounds like you are having issues entering your bank account number. I will fetch someone to help you.

rules.name: Set up a payment profile
rules.description: Sets up a payment profile

params.functionMessage:
<speak>
  I am about to setup a payment profile.
  <break time="2s"/>
</speak>

rules.name: Advise of receipt number
rules.description: Advises of the receipt number

params.message: Your receipt number is: {{characterSpeechSlow SetupPaymentProfile.ReceiptNumber}}

rules.name: Advise error
rules.description: Advises the customer of an error

params.message: An error occurred while setting up your payment profile. The cause was: {{IntegrationErrorCause}}.

rules.name: Return to parent menu
rules.description: Returns to the parent menu

rules.name: Fetch a BSB
rules.description:
Fetches a BSB for validation. Current valid BSB numbers: 
   ANZ - 012002
   CBA - 064000
   NAB - 082001

params.offerMessage: Please enter your 6 digit B.S.B. and then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: You entered your B.S.B as {{characterSpeechFast BankAccountBSB}}. If this is correct press 1. Press 2 to enter another B.S.B.
params.errorMessage1: You didn't enter a 6 digit B.S.B. number.
params.errorMessage2:
You didn't enter a 6 digit B.S.B. number. 
You can try these mocked banks:
ANZ {{characterSpeechFast '012002'}}. 
CBA {{characterSpeechFast '064000'}}.
NAB {{characterSpeechFast '082001'}}.
params.errorMessage3: It sounds like you are having trouble entering your B.S.B. number. I will fetch someone to assist you.

rules.name: Validate BSB
rules.description: Validates a BSB

params.functionMessage:
<speak>
  I am validating your BSB number. Please hold the line.
  <break time="3s"/>
</speak>

rules.name: Validation failure
rules.description: Message on validation failure

params.message: I failed to validate your BSB: {{characterSpeechFast BankAccountBSB}}

rules.name: Validation success
rules.description: Message successful BSB validation

params.message: I validated your BSB Number and located your bank as: {{characterSpeechFast ValidateBSB.BankCode}}

rules.name: Back to parent menu
rules.description: Back to parent menu

name: 00554000 - Retrieve payment profile
description: Tests retrieving a customer's payment profile

rules.name: Fetch customer scenario
rules.description: Fetches the customer scenario

params.offerMessage: Please enter a single digit customer scenario identifier using your phone's keypad. Then press hash.
params.confirmationMessage: You have selected customer scenario: {{CustomerScenario}}. If this is correct press 1. Press 2 to select a different scenario.
params.errorMessage1: You didn't enter a single digit customer scenario identifier.
params.errorMessage2: You didn't enter a single digit customer scenario identifier. The customer scenario identifier controls mock web service responses.
params.errorMessage3: It sounds like you are having trouble selecting a customer scenario identifier.

rules.name: Retrieve payment profile
rules.description: Retrieves payment profile for a customer

params.functionMessage:
<speak>
  I am just looking up your account details. Please hold the line.
  <break time="1s"/>
</speak>

rules.name: Read payment profile details
rules.description: Plays details of the retrieved payment profile

params.message: Your payment profile is currently set up with type: {{PaymentProfile.PaymentProfileType}}

rules.name: No payment profile
rules.description: Plays a message when the customer has no recurring payment profile

params.message: You have no recurring payments set up.

rules.name: Debug error
rules.description: Debugs an integration error

params.message: Retrieving payment profile failed. {{#if IntegrationErrorCause}}The error cause was:  {{IntegrationErrorCause}}{{/if}}

rules.name: Return
rules.description: Returns the the parent menu

name: 00590000 - Development errors
description: Rule set that gets development errors

rules.name: Error message
rules.description: Plays an error message

params.message: This is the development error rule set. You will land here if you repeatedly enter invalid inputs.

rules.name: Hang up
rules.description: Hangs up for now
